title: Odion Ighalo - Wikipedia
snippet: On 4 February 2021, Ighalo joined Saudi Professional League club Al Shabab on a two-and-a-half-year contract.

title: Odion Ighalo: Nigeria striker joins Al Hilal from Al Shabab - BBC Sport
snippet: Nigeria striker Odion Ighalo leaves Saudi Arabian side Al Shabab for city rivals Al Hilal on an 18-month deal.

title: Odion Ighalo: Saudi Professional League Player Watch - Coaches' Voice
snippet: Manchester United loaned Odion Ighalo from Shanghai Shenhua, and the striker has since moved on to Al Shabab of the Saudi Professional League

title: Saudi Arabia's Al Shabab FC sign Odion Ighalo
snippet: Riyadh: Saudi Arabia's Al Shabab FC have announced the signing of former Manchester United forward Odion Ighalo on a two and a half year contract.

title: Former Man United striker Ighalo joins Saudi side Al Shabab | Reuters
snippet: HONG KONG (Reuters) - Former Manchester United striker Odion Ighalo has joined Saudi Arabiaâ€™s Al Shabab from Chinese Super League side Shanghai Shenhua.
